title: Personalized Science Learning Strategy Design Using Augmented Reality Learning Analytics

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment combining AR applications and learning analytics tools in a BYOD setting

learning_goals: Learners will analyze behavioral data collected from AR-based science simulations to derive individual learning patterns.
Learners will design personalized strategies to adjust the difficulty level and pacing of AR content based on learning analytics.
Learners will propose an optimal collaboration strategy in AR learning environments through team-based formative assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
